CustomField.description: This is an Agile reference to the level of commitment of the Project Team. A Pig is 100% dedicated to the Project while a Chicken either provides input and consults occasionally throughout the Project or is kept informed via status meetings. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Chicken_and_the_Pig
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pigs are completely committed to delivery and outcome of the Project. Chickens are involved, but add intermittent input or receive regular Project updates.
CustomField.label: Level
